trans-unit.source: The Batch service can install user provided certificates on compute nodes in order to authenticate operations, perform encryption and decryption, etc.
trans-unit.target: The Batch service can install user provided certificates on compute nodes in order to authenticate operations, perform encryption and decryption, etc.

trans-unit.source: A typical use of certificates is to encrypt user secret information.
trans-unit.target: A typical use of certificates is to encrypt user secret information.

trans-unit.source: The user creates a certificate, adds it to the Batch account (via the Add a certificate API) and associates it with the pool where the information is going to be used (via the Add a pool API).
trans-unit.target: The user creates a certificate, adds it to the Batch account (via the Add a certificate API) and associates it with the pool where the information is going to be used (via the Add a pool API).

trans-unit.source: The user then encrypts the secrets using the certificate, and passes them to a task either as a command line parameter or in one of the resource files.
trans-unit.target: The user then encrypts the secrets using the certificate, and passes them to a task either as a command line parameter or in one of the resource files.

trans-unit.source: The task program has access to the certificate, and can use it to decrypt the secrets.
trans-unit.target: The task program has access to the certificate, and can use it to decrypt the secrets.

trans-unit.source: A common example of a user secret is an Azure Storage account key, where the user wants the task to download data from a storage account.
trans-unit.target: A common example of a user secret is an Azure Storage account key, where the user wants the task to download data from a storage account.

trans-unit.source: The Add a certificate API can be used to add a certificate to an account.
trans-unit.target: The Add a certificate API can be used to add a certificate to an account.

trans-unit.source: The user can then refer to the certificate when creating a new pool, or can update an existing pool to refer to the new certificate.
trans-unit.target: The user can then refer to the certificate when creating a new pool, or can update an existing pool to refer to the new certificate.

trans-unit.source: The Batch service then installs the referenced certificates on each node of the pool.
trans-unit.target: The Batch service then installs the referenced certificates on each node of the pool.
